_sText:
Hi 

This fix2 was for mg and autorespawn mode server.
Thanks to $p@w! help me made mg server to test my vehicle and we fix meny bug. 

* Teleport bug was wen i parent this to vehicle, so i have no parent now.
* Driver camera view disable pasanger 2,3,4 when exit, so i delet vehicle view camera.
* Player was inside Func button and they fall down in nonblock server, so i have brush box for player.
* For autorespawn deathmatch server when player enter and exit vehicle they have  diferent name, so i must make  trigger !activator name none befor they enter the map. Thanks to Z-RAY-Z for testing this on his server. If you finde more bug please tel me.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________


This is my fantasy terminator map. I made this map very fast to test my new vehicles hummer. Tel me what you like and dont like and i will try fix if i can. I have work 1 month with this Hummer i hope you like it. When hummer vehicles break they will spawn from garage.

[Video of the map...](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E7UBPeJgJIg "video")


* i have game_weapon_manager in the map that allows max 1 weapon on the floor, but for deagel is max.

* 4 prop_physic hummer vehicle 
* 2 coustom weapon 
* skybox



Thanks and have fun
